products.description: Their unilux pvc blackout roof blinds come in their most popular colour options - a great way for you to upgrade your skylight window at a value cost. products.title: Unilux Butter (Moisture Resistant)
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 3500mm fabric composition: pvc louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. products.title: Unilux Pvc Blackout White Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout white roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy.
